description: Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in TutorialCMS (aka Photoshop Tutorials) 1.00 and earlier allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the (1) catFile parameter to (a) browseCat.php or (b) browseSubCat.php; the (2) id parameter to (c) openTutorial.php, (d) topFrame.php, or (e) admin/editListing.php; or the (3) search parameter to search.php.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2007-2600

description: Buffer overflow in a certain ActiveX control in the GDivX Zenith Player AviFixer class in fix.dll 1.0.0.1 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a long SetInputFile property value.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2007-2601

description: Buffer overflow in MIBEXTRA.EXE in Ipswitch WhatsUp Gold 11 allows attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) or execute arbitrary code via a long MIB filename argument.  NOTE: If there is not a common scenario under which MIBEXTRA.EXE is called with attacker-controlled command line arguments, then perhaps this issue should not be included in CVE.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2007-2602

description: Unspecified vulnerability in the Init function in the Audio CD Ripper OCX (AudioCDRipperOCX.ocx) 1.0 ActiveX control allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (NULL dereference and Internet Explorer crash) via unspecified vectors.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2007-2603

description: Unspecified vulnerability in the FlexLabel ActiveX control allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (unstable behavior) via an improper initialization, as demonstrated by a certain value of the Caption property.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2007-2604

description: Unspecified vulnerability in the GetPropertyById function in ISoftomateObj in SoftomateLib in BRUJULA4.NET.DLL in the Brujula Toolbar (Brujula.net toolbar) allows attackers to cause a denial of service (NULL dereference and browser crash) via certain arguments.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2007-2605

description: Multiple buffer overflows in Firebird 2.1 allow attackers to trigger memory corruption and possibly have other unspecified impact via certain input processed by (1) config\ConfigFile.cpp or (2) msgs\check_msgs.epp.  NOTE: if ConfigFile.cpp reads a configuration file with restrictive permissions, then the ConfigFile.cpp vector may not cross privilege boundaries and perhaps should not be included in CVE.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2007-2606

description: PHP remote file inclusion vulnerability in views/print/printbar.php in LaVague 0.3 and earlier allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL in the views_path parameter.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2007-2607

description: PHP remote file inclusion vulnerability in lib/smarty/SmartyFU.class.php in Miplex2 Alpha 1 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL in the system[smarty][dir] parameter.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2007-2608

description: Multiple PHP remote file inclusion vulnerabilities in gnuedu 1.3b2 allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL in the (a) ETCDIR parameter to (1) libs/lom.php; (2) lom_update.php, (3) check-lom.php, and (4) weigh_keywords.php in scripts/; the (b) LIBSDIR parameter to (5) logout.php, (6) help.php, (7) index.php, (8) login.php; and the ETCDIR parameter to (9) web/lom.php.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2007-2609

description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in OpenLD before 1.1.9, and 1.1-modified before 1.1-modified3, allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified vectors in the Search feature, possibly the term parameter.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2007-2610

description: Multiple PHP remote file inclusion vulnerabilities in CGX 20050314 allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL in the pathCGX parameter to (1) mtdialogo.php, (2) ltdialogo.php, (3) login.php, and (4) logingecon.php in inc/; and multiple unspecified files in frm/, sql/, and cns/.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2007-2611

description: SQL injection vulnerability in libs/Wakka.class.php in WikkaWiki (Wikka Wiki) before 1.1.6.3 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the limit parameter.  NOTE: this issue only applies to a "modified installation."

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2007-2612

description: WikkaWiki (Wikka Wiki) before 1.1.6.3 allows attackers in a shared virtual host server environment to upload and execute an arbitrary configuration file by modifying the WAKKA_CONFIG environment variable.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2007-2613

description: PHP remote file inclusion vulnerability in examples/widget8.php in phpHtmlLib 2.4.0 and earlier allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL in the phphtmllib parameter.
